version_description:
+ You can raise your main weapon level to 12.
+ The probability of production and combination success (%) is displayed in the UI.
+ Some bugs have been fixed.

+ Ranking system pre-beta has been updated.
+ We have improved to make firearms more varied in production and combine.
+ Improved shield to protect 100% of enemy attack.
+ The level up of the pistol, grenade launcher and sniper rifle has been changed to be twice as fast.
+ Optimization has been done to reduce crashes on some devices.
+ Fixed some bugs related to rendering.
+ Characters Alex Lyon (RMG) and Gobu al-Paca (DB-12) are added.
+ The DB-12's reload speed is adjusted 0.2 seconds later.

+ French language added.
+ German language added.
+ Vietnamese language added.
+ Thai language added.

+ New map "killzone" have been updated.
+ You can get advanced gear parts from Killzone.
+ We adjusted the combination time from 10 seconds to 3 seconds.
+ Added formations in tactical changes.
+ Shield character AI has been improved.
+ Overall AI improved.
+ Some UI has been added and modified.
+ Fixed screen shaking bug.

+ Improved stability for game.
+ Players who cheat can not participate in the ranking battle.
+ Some bugs have been fixed.

+ Base movement speed increased by 10%.
+ Railgun-type skills can now be learned by other hero characters.
+ Enemy waves are limited in submissions.
+ Fixed the gun mounting bug that occurred while wearing the shield.

+ Premium version launch reward will be paid.
+ Kill Zone difficulty has been lowered.
+ Day time increased to 15 minutes.
+ HP status is also displayed at night.
+ Survivors no longer die easily
+ Skill learning UI bug has been fixed.
+ The loading screen image has been changed to appear in various.

+ New Character Sergeant (RSR + Modern Exosuit) has been added.
+ New character Chris Howard (RAR + Modern Exosuit) has been added.
+ Modern Exosuit has been added to the paid store.
+ Scripts for Alex, Chris, Gobu, and Sergeant have been added.
+ Increased the rate of occupying each zone.
+ Fixed some mistyped words.

+ Chicken and Dinosaur Costume Bug Fix
+ Confirmation window before purchase of paid store was added
+ Improved UI button

+ Engine update for game stabilization.
+ Gear Package Set has been added to paid shops.
+ Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented drop items from being acquired.
+ Fixed the problem of checking ranking battle version.
+ Fixed some bugs.

+ New character Lesser Pando has been added.
+ New gun MP7A2 has been added.
+ Weapon change system has been added.
+ Optimized memory and shader issues.

+ Fixed to be equipped as the main weapon in the ranking battle.
+ Fixed skill up issues for main and secondary weapons.

+ Winter zone has been added.
+ Firearms for winter zone reward have been added.
+ Arena mode has been added.
+ A new gun SIX12 has been added.
+ VIP firearms have been added to the store.

+ Winter zone has been added.
+ Firearms for winter zone reward have been added.
+ Arena mode has been added.
+ A new gun SIX12 has been added.
+ VIP firearms have been added to the store.

! Fixed an issue where the backpack button was not visible.
! Fixed an infinite loading issue at the result of the Winter-zone.
! Fixed timeline UI issue.

+ We have stabilized the game.
+ We optimized the game.

+ Fixed an issue where the game freezes at the start screen
+ Character attack logic improved

- AR: MCX added
- SMG: VECTOR added
- Fixed some translation issues
- Some UI changed
- IPAD supported
- Fixed the Winter Zone game ending issue
